info.title: Xano Metadata API - WORKSPACE
info.description: The Metadata API provides support to programatically manage your Xano instance and uses Access Tokens to control access.

get.summary: generate a full context for a workspace
get.description:
generate a full context for a workspace

Authentication: required

Required API Scope: Instance Workspace: Read

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

post.summary: Export database table schemas and branch configuration as a file
post.description:
Leave the `branch` parameter empty to indicate the current live branch. `password` is optional. If provided, will encrypt the export and will be required when importing the file.

Required API Scope: Instance Workspace: Read

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

post.summary: Export complete workspace data and configuration as an archive
post.description:
Leave the `branch` parameter empty to indicate the current live branch. `password` is optional. If provided, will encrypt the export and will be required when importing the file.

Required API Scope: Instance Workspace: Read

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.
